alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 21 at 9:51PM MST until August 22 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT FOR CENTRAL PIMA COUNTY... At 951 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms had produced heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain has fallen. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks, streams and highways. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... State Highway 86 between route 15 and route 34. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
